trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win#initcap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winsharpinitcap-md.md)] print dialog box that configures a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> and <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> according to user input and then prints a document.
trans-unit.target: 叫用標準[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win#initcap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winsharpinitcap-md.md)]列印 對話方塊，以設定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>和<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>根據使用者輸入，然後列印文件。

trans-unit.source: A user can use the **Print** dialog box to select a printer, configure it, and perform a print job.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以使用**列印**對話方塊來選取印表機、 加以設定，以及執行列印工作。

trans-unit.source: Strictly speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PrintDocument%2A> method without ever opening the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 嚴格來說，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PrintDocument%2A>方法，而不開啟對話方塊。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PrintDocument%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that sense, the control can be used as an unseen printing component.
trans-unit.target: 該意義而言，控制項可用來當作看不見的列印元件。

trans-unit.source: But for performance reasons, it would be better to use either the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.AddJob%2A> method or one of the many <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 但基於效能考量，最好是使用其中一個<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.AddJob%2A>方法，或其中一個多<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A><xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>方法</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A></xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A></xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.AddJob%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more about this, see [How to: Programmatically Print XPS Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關此，請參閱[How to︰ 以程式設計方式列印 XPS 檔](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this class, PrintDialog, with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請勿混淆這個類別，PrintDialog， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The latter is used with Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: 後者會搭配 Windows Form 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: PrintDialog is used with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: PrintDialog 搭配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the option to print the current page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用列印目前頁面的選項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the option to print the current page is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用列印目前頁面的選項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the highest page number that is allowed in page ranges.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許的最大頁面數目頁面範圍。

trans-unit.source: Users who click **Print** when the **Print** dialog box is set to print pages outside the range that is set by the MaxPage and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.MinPage%2A> values will get an error message advising them of the maximum and minimum page numbers.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下**列印**時**列印**對話方塊設定列印頁面由 MaxPage 所設定的範圍之外，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.MinPage%2A>值將會收到錯誤訊息等等的最大和最小的頁碼。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.MinPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Nothing will be printed.
trans-unit.target: 不會列印。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.UInt32> that represents the highest page number that can be used in a page range in the **Print** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.UInt32>表示可以使用中頁面範圍的最大頁面數目**列印** 對話方塊。</xref:System.UInt32>

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是設定為小於 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lowest page number that is allowed in page ranges.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面範圍的最低所允許的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: Users who click **Print** when the **Print** dialog box is set to print pages outside the range that is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.MaxPage%2A> and MinPage values will get an error message advising them of the maximum and minimum page numbers.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下**列印**時**列印**對話方塊設定列印頁的範圍外，由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.MaxPage%2A>MinPage 值將會取得錯誤訊息，告知其最大和最小的頁碼。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.MaxPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Nothing will be printed.
trans-unit.target: 不會列印。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.UInt32> that represents the lowest page number that can be used in a page range in the **Print** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.UInt32>表示可以使用中頁面範圍的最低頁碼**列印** 對話方塊。</xref:System.UInt32>

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是設定為小於 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the range of pages to print when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PageRangeSelection*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要列印的頁面範圍<xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PageRangeSelection*>設<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PageRangeSelection*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> that represents the range of pages that are printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"> </xref>表示的列印的頁面範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"></xref> object that is being used to set the property has either the beginning of the range or the end of the range set to a value that is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRange"> </xref>物件也就是用來設定屬性具有範圍的開頭或結尾的範圍設為小於 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection"></xref> for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection"></xref>的這個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection"></xref> value that represents the type of page range to print.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection"> </xref>值，表示要列印的頁面範圍的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面可列印區域的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the height of the printable page area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，代表可列印的頁面區域的高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面可列印區域的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the width of the printable page area.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>代表可列印的頁面區域的寬度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Prints a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 列印<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>目前已選取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> object to print.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref>列印的物件。

trans-unit.source: A description of the job that is to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要列印工作的描述。

trans-unit.source: This text appears in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the printer.
trans-unit.target: 此文字會出現在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的印表機。

trans-unit.source: documentPaginator is .
trans-unit.target: documentPaginatoris .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> that represents the printer that is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>表示已選取的印表機。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> that the user selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>使用者選取的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that is used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref> when the user clicks **Print** for the current print job.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> ，會由<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref>當使用者按一下**列印**目前列印工作。

trans-unit.source: Neither setting nor getting this property validates the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 設定或取得這個屬性都不會驗證<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To validate it use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>進行驗證

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that is used the next time the **Print** button in the dialog box is clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>用下次**列印**按下按鈕的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Setting this PrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> for a particular <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個 PrintTicket 屬性不會驗證或修改指定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>特定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket*> method to create a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>-specific <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket*>方法來建立<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>-特定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>這是適用於給定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Prints a visual (non-text) object, which is derived from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> class, to the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref> that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 列印視覺 （非文字） 物件，衍生自<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>類別，為<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>目前已選取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to print.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>列印。

trans-unit.source: A description of the job that is to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要列印工作的描述。

trans-unit.source: This text appears in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the printer.
trans-unit.target: 此文字會出現在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的印表機。

trans-unit.source: visual is .
trans-unit.target: visualis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the option to print the selected pages is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用列印選取的頁面的選項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the option to print the selected pages is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用列印選取的頁面的選項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref> as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog"></xref>為強制回應對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user clicks **Print**; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a user clicks **Cancel**; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a user closes the dialog box without clicking **Print** or **Cancel**.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者按一下**列印**;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若使用者按一下**取消**; 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果使用者關閉對話方塊而不是按一下**列印**或**取消**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users of the **Print** dialog box have the option to specify ranges of pages to print.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用者**列印**對話方塊中，則可指定要列印的頁面範圍。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the option is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用; 選項否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
